snippet.title: UltraViolet: Hollywood's giant digital gamble is here
snippet.description:
UltraViolet: Hollywood's giant digital gamble is here
Hollywood's big plan to update the industry for the digital era - UltraViolet - comes to the UK on 26 December, the consortium behind it has revealed. It will be an inauspicious start, represented by just one new movie release, but there's no mistaking the ambition of the project. Three years in the planning, UV is Hollywood's â€¦
Andrew Orlowski, 08 Dec 2011
